biotools.summary: CUBAP (Codon Usage Biases Across Populations) is an interactive web portal for analyzing codon usage biases across populations. Although synonymous codon usage does not change the protein primary structure, codon choice significantly impacts translational and transcriptional efficiency, gene expression, the secondary structure of both mRNA and proteins, and has been implicated in various diseases.
